original_text: Very early on the first day of the week, just after sunrise, they were on their way to the tomb
korean_text: 안식 후 첫날 매우 일찍이 해 돋을 때에 그 무덤으로 가며

sentences.original_text: Very early on the first day of the week
sentences.korean_translation: 매우 이른 시간에 주의 첫째 날에

sentences.original_text: they were on their way to the tomb
